scenes.description: Intro and transition following the previous performance.
Ninomae Ina'nis performs the song 'Hana ni Natte'.
Interlude and transition featuring mechanical stage changes.
Ninomae Ina'nis and IRyS perform the song 'Ubiquitous dB'.

subtitles.original:
花になって
Lyrics: 長屋晴子 Music: 穴見真吾
subtitles.english:
Become a Flower
Lyrics: Haruko Nagaya Music: Shingo Anami

subtitles.original: 陰にそっと隠れようがいいんじゃない？
subtitles.english: Why not just hide away in the shadows?

subtitles.original: つぼみのような花だっていいんじゃない？
subtitles.english: Why not be a flower that's still a bud?

subtitles.original: 秘密にして守るのがいいんじゃない？
subtitles.english: Why not keep it a secret and protect it?

subtitles.original: 誰にも邪魔されず可憐に咲いて
subtitles.english: Blooming beautifully without anyone in your way

subtitles.original: 甘い苦いにハマんない その判断がくだんない
subtitles.english: Not caught up in sweet or bitter, that judgment is pointless

subtitles.original: 気に病んで下を向かないでいて
subtitles.english: Don't let it get to you and look down

subtitles.original: 愛になっちゃいない 無駄に飾らない
subtitles.english: It hasn't become love, so don't decorate it needlessly

subtitles.original: 綺麗にされた花瓶も 肥やしも何もいらない
subtitles.english: I don't need a pretty vase, or fertilizer, or anything

subtitles.original: その姿が美しい
subtitles.english: Your appearance just as it is, is beautiful

subtitles.original: 花になって
subtitles.english: Become a flower

subtitles.original: ほらニヒルに笑って
subtitles.english: Come on, give a nihilistic smile

subtitles.original: その真顔に
subtitles.english: At that serious face

subtitles.original: ゾクゾクして目が離せない
subtitles.english: I get a thrill and can't look away

subtitles.original: 味見して
subtitles.english: Take a taste

subtitles.original: 君の毒は私の薬って
subtitles.english: Saying your poison is my medicine

subtitles.original: 包んであげるから
subtitles.english: Because I'll wrap it all up

subtitles.original: 笑って
subtitles.english: Smile

subtitles.original: 逢いたい 逢いたい その笑顔に 逢いたい 逢いたい
subtitles.english: I want to see, I want to see your smile, I want to see, I want to see

subtitles.original: って言えば笑ってくれるかな
subtitles.english: If I say that, I wonder if you'll smile?

subtitles.original: 陰から支えるくらいがいいんじゃない？
subtitles.english: Isn't it enough to just support you from the shadows?

subtitles.original: 欲を言えばこの手で咲かせてみたい
subtitles.english: If I were to be greedy, I'd want to make you bloom with these hands

subtitles.original: 病のように心を喰らう花
subtitles.english: A flower that devours the heart like a disease

subtitles.original: 枯らしたくないのさ
subtitles.english: I don't want you to wither

subtitles.original: 光が届かずとも
subtitles.english: Even if the light doesn't reach

subtitles.original: 水をあげ続けるから
subtitles.english: I'll keep giving you water

subtitles.original: いい加減に気付いて 君は素敵って
subtitles.english: Please just realize that you're wonderful

subtitles.original: 自惚れてもっとね大事に
subtitles.english: Be conceited and take better care of yourself

subtitles.original: 無自覚なまま愛を蓄えて
subtitles.english: Accumulating love while being unaware of it

subtitles.original: 綺麗にされた花瓶も 肥やしも何もいらない
subtitles.english: I don't need a pretty vase, or fertilizer, or anything

subtitles.original: その姿で咲き誇れ
subtitles.english: Bloom in full glory, just as you are

subtitles.original: 花になって
subtitles.english: Become a flower

subtitles.original: ほらニヒルに笑って
subtitles.english: Come on, give a nihilistic smile

subtitles.original: その真顔に
subtitles.english: At that serious face

subtitles.original: ゾクゾクして目が離せない
subtitles.english: I get a thrill and can't look away

subtitles.original: 味見して
subtitles.english: Take a taste

subtitles.original: 君の毒は私の薬って
subtitles.english: Saying your poison is my medicine

subtitles.original: 包んであげるから
subtitles.english: Because I'll wrap it all up

subtitles.original: 楽にして
subtitles.english: Put your mind at ease

subtitles.original: 君の闇は私の光って
subtitles.english: Saying your darkness is my light

subtitles.original: 愛してあげるから
subtitles.english: Because I'll love you

subtitles.original: 笑って
subtitles.english: Smile

subtitles.original:
Ubiquitous dB
Lyrics: hotaru Music: やしきん
subtitles.english:
Ubiquitous dB
Lyrics: hotaru Music: Yashikin

subtitles.original: 曖昧なボリュームじゃまだ足りないなんて
subtitles.english: An ambiguous volume is still not enough
